## [See Also](/documentation/appkit/nsapplication/shouldbeginsuppressinghighdynamicrangecontent#see-also)

### [Displaying high dynamic resolution (HDR) content](/documentation/appkit/nsapplication/shouldbeginsuppressinghighdynamicrangecontent#Displaying-high-dynamic-resolution-HDR-content)

[`var applicationShouldSuppressHighDynamicRangeContent: Bool`](/documentation/appkit/nsapplication/applicationshouldsuppresshighdynamicrangecontent)A boolean value indicating whether your application should suppress HDR content based on established policy. Built-in AppKit components such as NSImageView will automatically behave correctly with HDR content. You should use this value in conjunction with notifications (`NSApplicationShouldBeginSuppressingHighDynamicRangeContentNotification` and `NSApplicationShouldEndSuppressingHighDynamicRangeContentNotification`) to suppress HDR content in your application when signaled to do so.[`struct ShouldEndSuppressingHighDynamicRangeContent`](/documentation/appkit/nsapplication/shouldendsuppressinghighdynamicrangecontent)
